LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to use Table storage from .NET
How to use Table storage from .NET
Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await
Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: // Create the table client. CloudTableClient tableClient = storageAccount.CreateCloudTableClient();
// Get a reference to a table named "peopleTable" CloudTable table = tableClient.GetTableReference("peopleTable");

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: // Create the CloudTable if it does not exist await table.CreateIfNotExistsAsync();
